attributes.action: Please Bike Jumps / Park in Tauntons Unused fields
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Taunton, i am fully aware has many fields / areas owned by the council that are disused, even ware houses. These in my point of view, and many others, could be the start of something great.

Over the past 7 years there has been an increase in youths disrupting / vandalising etc in Taunton, due to a lack of areas of 'activity areas' for them to go. 

My proposal is to find a field / warehouse / area to build a skate park or dirt jumps for the Many bike riders taunton and near by areas have.

Taunton has a frequently used and easy acess trainstation, so that it will be home to even people from otherplaces, increasing local busnisess sales and interest, and altogether keeping Tauntons youths out of trouble and giving them something to look forward to after school or college.

All we need is this one thing. 

Please sign.

Matthew Gerrard

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
